mapper.insert: insert into log(time, type, message, operation_teacher, operation_student, operation_table, comy) values (#{log.time}, #{log.type}, #{log.message}, #{log.operation_teacher}, #{log.operation_student}, #{log.operation_table}, #{log.comy})
mapper.select:
select * from log
where comy like "%" #{comy} "%"
order by time desc limit #{page},7

select * from log where date_format(time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and comy like "%" #{comy} "%"
order by time desc

select * from log where date_format(time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m')
and comy like "%" #{comy} "%"
order by time desc

select * from log where date_format(time, '%Y') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y')
and comy like "%" #{comy} "%"
order by time desc

select * from log where time like "%" #{date} "%"
and comy like "%" #{comy} "%"
order by time desc
